name: hypercerts
description: Scalable retrospective reward systems for impact
author: Hypercerts Foundation

scripts.copy: yarn copy:frontend && yarn copy:docs && yarn copy:html
scripts.copy:html: find build/ -name '*.html' -type f | grep -v index.html | sed s/\.html$// | xargs -I _ bash -c 'mkdir -p _ && cp -v _.html _/index.html'
scripts.deploy:site: turbo run build --filter=@hypercerts-org/docs --filter=hypercerts-protocol && turbo run deploy --filter=@hypercerts-org/frontend && yarn copy
scripts.e2e:serve-for-dev: (docker-compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./.env.local --env-file ./docker/base.env down || true) && docker-compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./.env.local --env-file ./docker/base.env up
scripts.e2e:serve-for-test: (docker-compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./.env.local --env-file ./docker/base.env down || true) && ENVIRONMENT=tests docker-compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./.env.local --env-file ./docker/base.env --profile testing up
